channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple News+ adds a new game that uses emoji and Genmoji to sovle puzzles
item.description: Released to coincide with World Emoji Day, the new Emoji Game is part logic, part word game that's inspired by how we use emojis to communicate.

item.title: TikTok is adding features for songwriters to its app
item.description: TikTok is adding a new label to its app, allowing songwriters to highlight their profiles

item.title: 4 Best Music Streaming Services (2024): Spotify, Apple Music, and More Compared
item.description: Plunge into the stream with the best apps to discover music, share it among friends, and rock out.

item.title: Squarespace Promo Codes: 50% Off | July 2025
item.description: Get 10% off your next website with an exclusive Squarespace discount code, with up to 50% off plans, and more top discounts this July.

item.title: Bring On the MAGA Revolt
item.description: Donald Trump’s own strategists and advisers aren’t sure the president’s base will survive Jeffrey Epstein’s ghost.

item.title: Jack Dorsey pumps $10 million into a nonprofit focused on open-source social media
item.description: Jack Dorsey backs nonprofit 'and Other Stuff' with $10M to build open social technology.

item.title: Where Are All the AI Drugs?
item.description: In an industry where 90 percent of drug candidates fail before reaching the market, a handful of startups are betting everything on AI to beat the odd...

item.title: India eyes global quantum computer push — and QpiAI is its chosen vehicle
item.description: QpiAI, an Indian startup that integrates AI and quantum computing for enterprise use cases, has raised $32 million in a new funding round co-led by th...

item.title: Beeper’s all-in-one messaging app relaunches with an on-device model and premium upgrades
item.description: Multi-service messaging app Beeper, which allows people to connect to all their chat apps from one interface, is relaunching its app on Wednesday to o...

item.title: Can US Measles Outbreaks Be Stopped?
item.description: The US almost lost its measles elimination status once. Lessons from that episode suggest it will be more difficult to avoid doing so now.
